confirmation_safeBccThresholdCheckboxLab: [警告] To/Cc 包含${threshold}个以上的域
confirmation_safeBccThresholdForAttendee: [警告] Attendees 包含${threshold}个以上的域
confirmation_unsafeAttachmentCheckboxLab: [警告] 包含不安全的文件名 (${name})
prohibition_messageBeforeForRecipients: There are recipients prohibited to send.
newlyAddedDomainReconfirmation_messageBe: 收件人添加了以下原邮件收件人中未包含的域名地址。
There are attendees with domains not included in the attendees of the original appointment.
newlyAddedDomainReconfirmation_messageAf: 请确认是否要发送此邮件？
setting_trustedDomainsPolicy:
# 信任域，地址 ###
# 以下域，地址是由组策略信任的。
#
# ${policy}
#
# 要添加更多的域，地址，请在下面输入条目（每行一个）。
# 你也可以通过在开头添加"-"来排除域名，地址。
# And wildcards (* and ?) are also available.
# When an entry contains @, the entry is regarded as address.
# When an entry does not contains @, the entry is regarded as domain.
##################################

${user}
setting_trustedDomainsTemplate:
# 信任域，地址 ###
#
# (1) 设置域，地址被视为内部目的地
# (2) 每行写一个条目，如下所示
# (3) 以 "#" 开头的行被忽略
# (4) Wildcards (* and ?) are available.
# (5) When an entry contains @, the entry is regarded as address.
# (6) When an entry does not contains @, the entry is regarded as domain.
#
##################################

example.com
example.org
setting_unsafeDomainsPolicy:
# 不安全域，地址 ###
# 以下域，地址被组策略视为不安全的域，地址。
#
# ${policy}
#
# 要添加更多的域，地址，请在下面输入条目（每行一个）。
# 你也可以通过在开头添加"-"来排除域名，地址。
# And wildcards (* and ?) are also available.
# When an entry contains @, the entry is regarded as address.
# When an entry does not contains @, the entry is regarded as domain.
##################################

${user}
setting_unsafeDomainsTemplate:
# 不安全域，地址 ###
#
# (1) 设置要被提醒的域，地址
# (2) 每行写一个条目，如下所示
# (3) 以 "#" 开头的行被忽略
# (4) Wildcards (* and ?) are available.
# (5) When an entry contains @, the entry is regarded as address.
# (5) When an entry does not contains @, the entry is regarded as domain.
#
##################################

example.jp
example.net
setting_unsafeFilesPolicy:
# 不安全的文件名 ###
# 以下关键词被组策略认为是不安全的。
#
# ${policy}
#
# 要添加更多的关键词，请在下面输入条目（每行一个）。
# 你也可以通过在开头添加"-"来排除关键词。
# And wildcards (* and ?) are also available.
##################################

${user}
setting_unsafeFilesTemplate:
# 不安全的文件名 ###
#
# (1) 为附件设置警告关键字
# (2) 每行写一个条目，如下所示
# (3) 以 "#" 开头的行被忽略
# (4) Wildcards (* and ?) are available.
#
##################################

秘密
setting_configCountEnabled: 发送信息时启用倒计时
setting_configMainSkipIfNoExt: 如果所有目的地都是受信任的，则立即发送
setting_configAppointmentConfirmationEna: Enable confirmation on sending an appointment from Calendar.
setting_configSafeBccEnabled: 当To/Cc包含许多域时发出警告
setting_configSafeNewDomainsEnabled: 当回复的收件人地址中新增了与现有收件人域名不同的地址时，系统将警告确认
setting_delayDeliverySeconds: Delay delivery a message by (in seconds)
